Posts.Content: Please share me your advice My son Ghassan, 30 years old, has astrocytoma cancer, with no deletion in q1p19 chromosomes, in left frontoprietal since February 2013, he exposed for two surgical operations. the last one was in 2014 where most of the mass was removed. Before the last operation he exposed to radiotherapy and five cycles of CCNU as chemotherapy. MRI showed good results after the last operation.Before 3 months his condition was deterioted and MRI showed enhaciment in the tumor compatible with high grade glioma. Temodal as chemotherapy is prescribed for Ghassan, now he finished the third cycle of temadol since two weeks, we wait for MRI, but unfortunately his condition is very bad, he complains from continuous headache , unable to move his right hand, also he control with very difficult Â the lower part of his body , very slowly walking, pain in back and lower joints. Why these symptoms are developed What can you advice me Thanks for all His father riyad
Posts.Title: My son Ghassan
